option.name: originalContent
option.value:
Viridienne
  • Home
  • About
  • Skills
  • Projects
  • Contact

Hi, I'm Viridienne

Unity Developer

Transforming gaming passion into a profession

View My Work

About Me

I make games that click. 2D or 3D, mobile or PC — if it moves, glows, or explodes in Unity, I've probably built it. I focus on tight game feel, polished interactions, and systems that scale.

Experience

Unity Developer

Amanotes · Full-time

Feb 2025 – Present · 5 mos · On-site

C#
Unity
Generative AI
Gitlab
Fork

Unity Developer

PlayAd · Full-time

Jul 2024 – Feb 2025 · 8 mos · Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam · On-site

C#
Unity
Firebase
Ads SDK
UI/UX

At PlayAd, each project only has one developer, one artist, and a designer, which means I had to handle almost every aspect, for example:

  • Intergrade Company's Ads SDK, Firebase etc...
  • Customize FX to be suitable for the game
  • Create a friendly, maintainable framework
  • Implement UI

Lately, I have been involved in maintaining and operating the company's high-traffic projects, with my responsibilities including:

  • Add new game content based on the existing source code from other developers.
  • Resolve any remaining bugs left by other developers in the project.
C#Unity+1 skill

Unity Developer (Project's Dev team Sub Leader)

Topebox · Full-time

Nov 2022 – Jun 2024 · 1 yr 8 mos · Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam · On-site

C#
Unity
Server API Integration
Team Leadership
  • Handle integrating server APIs
  • Ensure team's workflow, assign tasks for other members when needed
  • Developing the game's core mechanics
  • Help improving member's code when needed
  • Integrate UI/UX from artist design into the game
Mimiland - Game Xã Hội - Ứng dụng trên Google Play
The project that I dedicated most of my time to at Topebox
C#Unity+1 skill

Unity Developer

Latte Games · Part-time

Jul 2022 – Oct 2022 · 4 mos · Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam · On-site

C#
Unity
Rapid Prototyping
C#Unity+1 skill

Skills & Technologies

Unity Development

3D Game Development

2D Game Development

C#

Generative AI

Copilot, GPT, Claude, Cursor

Git

Fork

Firebase

Balancy

Featured Projects

The Wanderer

A 2D platformer action-adventure game where you play as a nameless wanderer caught in a mysterious conspiracy. Features combat, exploration, and an engaging narrative.

Unity 2D Platformer Action
Play on itch.io

The Swordman

A 3D action game featuring dynamic combat mechanics, immersive environments, and fluid character animations. Developed as a personal project to showcase advanced Unity development skills.

Unity 3D Action Combat
Watch Gameplay Video

Mimiland

Social simulation game where you build, explore, and interact in a vibrant city. Developed at Topebox.

Unity C# Mobile
View on Google Play View on App Store

Planet Extinction

Unleash cosmic power to destroy planets in this visually stunning, physics-based casual game. Developed at PlayAd.

Unity Physics Mobile
View on Google Play

Ball Destroy

Command elemental monsters to defend the planet from meteor storms in this fast-paced arcade game. Developed at PlayAd.

Unity Arcade Mobile
View on Google Play

Heroic Defense

Defend the galaxy in this strategic tower defense game with hero upgrades and epic battles. Developed at PlayAd.

Unity Tower Defense Mobile
View on Google Play View on App Store

The Singing Cats

Idle gacha music game where you collect and perform with adorable singing cats. Developed at Amanotes.

Unity Music Mobile
View on Google Play View on App Store

Get In Touch

hoanganh.tang0202@gmail.com
github.com/viridienne
viridienne.itch.io
linkedin.com/in/hoanganh0245

© 2024 Viridienne. All rights reserved.
